TextLibrary.Text: I received news this morning about that acquaintance of yours. It was difficult to come by because you will not tell me all that I need to know.
I received news this morning about that acquaintance of yours. It was difficult to come by because you will not tell me all that I need to know.

I received news this morning about that acquaintance of yours. It was difficult to come by because you will not tell me all that I need to know.
That this person you seek has been traveling through Northern Kor and up into the mountains. If you could give me more details, I could perhaps be of more help...

No, I cannot tell you any more. That will be enough. Thank you, Khrona.
